item.title: Lockdown: Fortify your API contracts with Approval testing
item.description:
TL;DR

“Storing API contracts as OpenAPI approval files in source control allows safer control over accidental changes.”

Controlling API Evolution

API development often faces challenges related to versioning and evolution. Ensuring that APIs can change without breaking existing clients or that code changes do not unintentionally alter an API is crucial. This problem arises in various contexts, whether it’s between a browser and a service, service-to-service, or asynchronous event formats.
